you think you're better than me

Success is counted sweetest
By those who ne'er succeed.
To comprehend a nectar
Requires sorest need.

Not one of all the purple host
Who took the flag today
Can tell the definition,
So clear, of victory,

As he, defeated, dying,
On whose forbidden ear
The distant strains of triumph
Break, agonized and clear.
 -Emily Dickinson

Much madness is divinest sense
To a discerning eye;
Much sense the starkest madness.
'Tis the majority
In this, as all, prevails.
Assent, and you are sane;
Demur, - you're straightway dangerous,
And handled with a chain.
 -Emily Dickinson

Love is anterior to life,
Posterior to death
Initial of creation, and
The exponent of breath.
 -Emily Dickinson

patterns: Do you know any ant facts?
I bet you don't know any ant facts, loser
responses: Ants are a type of insect
There are roughly around 10,000 different species of ants
Ant species range from 2 to 25mm long
Ants are usually brown, yellow, red or black
Ants are Omnivores, they eat plants and other animals
Thier average lifespan is anything from several weeks to several years
For more info on ants, go to https://www.twinkl.co.uk/teaching-wiki/ant#:~:text=Ants%20are%20social%20insects%20and,to%20help%20make%20their%20nests.
Ants live on every continent in the world, except Antarctica
Ants live in colonies with many other ants
Ant colonies can sometimes be in trees or even buildings
An ant colony can last for several years
Queen ants live longer than worker ants
Ant habitats are controlled by the queen ant
Queen ants lay thousands of ant eegs and make sure the colony survives
What humans call worker ants are all wingless female ants
Worker ants forage and collect food for the colony
Ants make up half of the living insects in tropical forrests
An ant colony can contain around 12,000 ants!
If the queen ant dies, the colony will soon die without her. (very leonard cohen)
Ants eat nectar, seeds, fungus or other insects
Different ant species have different diets
Ants can lift 20 times thier own body weight
